title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction, Brief review of measurement techniques of different process parameters in steel industry; Control valves, Electrohydraulic and Electromechanical Actuators; Process Control : mathematical descriptions of SISO and MIMO processes; different control strategies; feedback, feed forward, ratio and cascade control, Tuning of PID controllers, Model based control, Digital implementation of analog control; Sequential Control; Programmable Logic Controller; Distributed Automation; DDC, SCADA and Hierarchical control, Communication protocols; Case studies related to steel making processes: BOF, Rolling mills, Materials Handling and Robotics.
